attributes.action: Press for the granting of a  Royal Pardon for Stephen Thorburn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The green grocer who still wanted to supply his customers in pounds and ounzes and why not?
He was English and he only did what true Englishmen do, give the customer what they want. He did and was persecuted for it. He took a decision and that was, Fight it!
He did and he won.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
